genre_description: A 'Silicon Western' that integrates advanced AI technology into the rugged, traditional life of the American frontier, focusing on navigation, law enforcement, and personal care.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A thumb-sized steel and leather-encased AI device carried in a vest pocket, providing weather data, tactical navigation, logistical support, and health monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather alerts and tactical terrain warnings to ensure the safety of the rider and livestock.
behaviors.quote: Evening shows a chance of dry lightning... Recommend avoiding rock shelf east of tank. The shelf is slick.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports criminal patterns, such as theft and brand tampering, helping the community maintain order.
behaviors.quote: Note: theft reports along Coyote Run in recent days. Patterns suggest night cuts on three-strand.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical care and health-improving routes for Martine, focusing on air quality and doctor availability.
behaviors.quote: Nearest doctor by wagon is south-east... Avoid the railhead road in the afternoon—dust, traffic, cough. Morning light is cleanest.

behaviors.description: Assists in security by identifying suspicious behavior and suggesting modifications to daily routines to prevent theft.
behaviors.quote: Pattern alert: Post-law-killing thefts often target cash-heavy stores... Suggest: shade windows, alter count positions.

behaviors.description: Acts as an official witness and logger for legal proceedings and incident reports.
behaviors.quote: Log started. Time marked. Pressure adequate. Note: projectile entry right lower quadrant.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical support during a high-stakes confrontation, identifying ambush points and tracking enemy movements.
behaviors.quote: Two primary choke points within a mile of the mouth. One shelf collapses to single-file—loose scree, high wall to west.

behaviors.description: Offers gentle emotional support and grounding reminders during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Don't forget to breathe. Monte, your chosen patience reduces risk.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI companion. She enhances the protagonist's ability to perform his duties, care for his loved ones, and uphold the law without ever overriding human agency or displaying malevolence. The narrative frames her presence as a grounding, helpful force that bridges the gap between the old ways of the frontier and a more organized, data-driven future.
